argument.name: Record_Number
argument.description: The record number (minus 1) corresponding to the index entry.

argument.name: record_number
argument.description: The position of the index entry (minus 1).

page.description: Returns record at position within the index.
page.discussion: The .KEY_RECORD_GET() method returns the record number of the entry at the specified position within the index
page.example: dim tbl as P dim indx as P tbl = table.open("customer") indx = tbl.index_primary_put("Lastname") ? indx.key_record_get(0) = 31 ? indx.key_get() = Key = "Abrams " Record = 32
